attributes.action: Bring Back The Death Sentence for Rapists And Child Molesters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prime Minister, with regards to the latest sexual abuse and murder of an innocent 2 year old girl, i feel the only way to deal with these monsters is death! eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
